column4: has anyone tried using NDISWrapper to install ethernet drivers in AMD64?
there is a tutorial for that... AFAIR
by the by, running AMD64 version
:) yup i saw that... have you got the drivers with you ??
well, I have the drivers for 32-bit XP, but will those work?
i think they would... in the meantime search for the 64 bit ones
ok, well, right now I'm still downloading those drivers I sent a link to, and I'm in windows because my connection is crap in Ubuntu, so give me a few minutes
take your time...but i cant promise you much of help
well, that's ok, I think most people here are probably ore experienced with NDISWrapper than I am
so anything you do would be considered help
